title: enVie A Vegan Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Canadian
description: Began as a vegan meals delivery and opened this licensed restaurant in Aug 2013. Menu focuses on organic and local produce with raw options, daily desserts, weekly specials. Menu is 95% gluten free. Its to-go fridge offers house-made vegan cheese and seitan, packaged meals for take home. Hosts cooking classes. Oct 2014 reported no delivery service.
